channel.title: Background

item.title: Background
item.dc:creator: @Skizard Skizard
item.description:
@Skizard wrote:

Hello,
Right now Iâ€™m trying to add this image as my background but it never wants to show.
I have tried many things like:

body { background: url('./images/background.jpg') repeat fixed top right; padding-right: 250px; }

body { background-image: url('./images/background.jpg') repeat fixed top right; padding-right: 250px; }

body { background: url(./images/background.jpg) repeat fixed top right; padding-right: 250px; }

body { background-image: url(./images/background.jpg) repeat fixed top right; padding-right: 250px; }
Nothing seems to be working.
Can someone help me fix this.
EDIT: I fixed it nvm XD
